key_findings.4.2_trend_regime: Strong Trend Only (>0.7) improved Net Sharpe from 0.119 to 0.308
key_findings.4.3_correlation_gating: Very Conservative (z<1) achieved Net Sharpe 0.368 with lower DD
key_findings.4.4_quarter_end: Full Reversion at QE achieved Net Sharpe 0.342
key_findings.4.6_lunar_robustness: No effect detected - confirms methodology robustness
